Text:
For some reason I'm unable to open the Official Archives (with Unarchiver)  file inside this torrent.  Unfortunately, that's what I downloaded the torrent for.

Anyone else have this problem?

@whaletail: Suggestions...

Try another archiver (unrarx or other)

Try changing the file extension from .cbr to .rar

Try a comic reader instead of an archiver - e.g.:

http://download.cnet.com/Comical/3000-2130_4-142317.html
